title: What is the new "SettingsToPersist.json" file?
body:
Located here: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.46\deploy\DATA\CFG\defaults

Some things in this file scare me, such as:

                        { "name": "OSXMouseAcceleration", "persisted": true },

The hell is this? I'm not playing on a mac. Why is it true?

replies.body:
Not sure! There are lots of files moving around and being renamed with the New Client and the changes happening in your installation directory will often reflect that. Since I'm not a developer that works on the game or client, I don't have a more in-depth answer for you, unfortunately.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
